trust.title: Digital damage reporting made simple, secure, and lightning fast
trust.description: Skado transforms a stressful situation into a simple and safe process. With MitID signature, GPS, and intelligent image documentation, we create reports that all insurance companies can trust — in under 2 minutes.
trust.security: Data quality in a format insurance companies can trust
trust.securityDesc: Skado delivers structured, verified claim information — with photos, metadata, GPS, and signature — enabling faster and more accurate case processing from the very first second.
trust.speedDesc: Automated image guiding, MitID verification, and correctly collected information reduce support time, error reporting, and follow-up requests. Less administration for the company — less waiting time for the customer.

aboutus.title: Our Mission
aboutus.dec1: When an injury occurs, the situation is often chaotic. There is stress, time pressure, documentation that is missing, and uncertainty about what needs to be done.
aboutus.dec2: That's why we've developed Skado.dk as Denmark's most user-friendly and reliable platform for claims reporting.
aboutus.secondsectiondec: We've built Skado.dk around cutting-edge technologies designed to provide security, accuracy, and peace of mind during stressful situations.
aboutus.securitydec: We prioritize data protection and legal compliance in every step of the claims process.
aboutus.speeddec: Reducing the time from accident to resolution through smart automation and clear workflows.
aboutus.Centereddesigndec: Built for real-life situations where stress is high and clarity is essential.
aboutus.mitiddec: Secure digital signatures for legal compliance
aboutus.gpsdec: Automatic location verification for accurate reporting
aboutus.multilingualdec: Flows for foreign parties in their language
